uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.preferences

Class Preference

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.AbstractSetting<java.lang.Boolean>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.Feature
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.preferences.Preference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Setting>, TypeConverter<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.String>, PreferenceSetting<java.lang.Boolean>, Setting<java.lang.Boolean>, Targetted<java.lang.Boolean>

    public class Preference
extends Feature
implements PreferenceSetting<java.lang.Boolean>
    A Preference is a Feature that only affects presentation logic so a user is allowed to override the system-wide value with their own setting. This can be dynamically degraded to a non-settable Feature busing the boolean config parameter service.feature.name.settable
